  • Contact

My name's George and currently I am a Ph.D. student at Imperial College London under the supervision of Dr. Stefanos Zafeiriou and Dr. Bjoern Schuller. My research interests include deep learning, computer vision, matrix factorisation, and emotion recognition.

Publications

Mnemonic Descent Method: A recurrent process applied for end-to-end face alignment

Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2016
